Producer: Brian Pitt, David Shojai, Nicolas Chartier, Jonathan Deckter, Roger Kumble
Synopsis: Picking up where Beautiful Disaster left off, Abby and Travis wake up after a crazy night in Vegas as accidental newlyweds. With their best friends in tow and Abby's six-figure poker winnings, they travel to Mexico, where they can enjoy a wild, lavish honeymoon. But as chaos follows "Trabby" at every turn, they must decide if they belong together -- or if this marriage is another disaster waiting to happen.
Title: Beautiful Wedding
